Wonstein

Introduction

Jeong Jiwon, popularly known as Wonstein, is a South Korean singer and rapper signed with Beautiful Noise. He made his debut in 2014 with “Replay”.

He appeared on various shows namely Show Me the Money Season 4, Show Me the Money Season 777, Show Me the Money Season 8, and Show Me the Money Season 9.

He gained attention for his unique soothing voice and was featured on various artists’ tracks. He is also a member of the groups X4 and MSG Wannabe.
